1: Ri e u tzij tak ri Salomon: Ri c'ojolaxel ri c'o u no'j quebuquicotisaj ri u tat u nan; ri c'ojolaxel man c'o ta u no'j cuban chque chi caquirik c'ax.
2: Ri k'inomal tak ri xa quet'orixic man c'o ta quechbex na chque, are' c'u ri tz'akatinic pa ronojel cäto'tajisan chuwäch ri cämical.
3: Ri Ajawaxel man cuya' ta can ri utzalaj winak pa numic, man cuya' ta c'u che ri banal etzelal chi canojic ri u munil.
4: Jubik' chac, mebayil; q'ui chac, k'inomal.
5: U yaquic u wäch ri ulew pa sak'ij quech ajno'jab; ri u banic waram aretak cäyac u wäch ri ulew quech wa' ri man c'o ta qui q'uixbal.
6: Puwi' ri utzalaj winak quejäbin tewichibal, are' c'u ri banal etzelal cäjik'isaxic rumal u banic tokinic.
7: Ri utzalaj winak cänatax cuc' tak tewichibal; ri banal etzelal chanim cäsach u nataxic.
8: Ri c'o u no'j quebuc'amowaj takanic; ri quebubij chi man c'o ta no'j cäsach u wäch pa etzeletajic.
9: Ri man c'o ta jubik' subunic cubano, man c'o ta jas cuxe'j wi rib; ri quieb u wäch u be, etzelal cuq'uisa' wi na u wäch.
10: Ri cäyup wächinic quebuc'am ulok nimak tak etzelal ri xuwi quebubij chi man c'o ta no'j cäsach u wäch pa etzeletajic.
11: Ri e u tzij ri suc' e u q'uiyibal c'aslemal, are' c'u ri banal etzelal cäjik'isaxic rumal u banic tokinic.
12: Ri etzelen wächaj quebuyac ch'o'j, are c'u ri lok'ok'ebal c'uxaj quebucuy conojel tak ri macunic.
13: Chque ri u chi' ri ajno'j e c'o no'jinic; che ri man c'o ta u no'j jun k'ebut cho rachak.
14: Ri c'o qui no'j man cäquesaj ta u tzijol ri quetamanic, aretak c'ut quech'aw ri man c'o ta qui no'j, xak quieb cubij.
15: Ri to'bal rib ri k'inom are' ri u k'inomal; ri u quiäkasakil ri meba' are' ri u tzubukil.
16: Ri tojbal re ri suc' are' ri c'aslemal; ri wächinic ri cuyac ri banal etzelal are' ri macaj.
17: Ri cuya' u xiquin che u tatabexic ri pixbenic benak pa ri be re c'aslemal; ri man coc ta il che, benak pa ri be re sachbal wächaj.
18: Quech ri banal tak tzij ri man u k'alajisaxic taj ri oyowaric, xukuje' quech man c'o ta qui no'j ri qui jabuxic tzijtal.
19: Ri sibalaj cäk'ijij che tzij q'ui sachinakil quebubano; ri u jiq'uixtajic ri ak'aj quech ajno'jab.
20: Coc'alaj sak puak are' ri rak' ri suc'; ri u chomabal ri lawalo man c'o ta u patan.
21: Ri e u chi' ri suc' quebutijoj q'uialaj winak, are' c'u ri man c'o ta u no'j cäcämic rumal rech ri u conil.
22: Ri u tewichibal ri Ajawaxel k'inomal wa' man c'o ta c'u k'oxomal quebuc'am ulok pa re wi.
23: Ri man c'o ta u no'j cäquicot che quesaxic q'uixbal; ri ajno'j cäquicot ruc' ri no'j.
24: Ri sibalaj cuxe'j wi rib ri banal etzelal are' wa' cuc'ulmaj na, are' c'u ri suc' queya'taj ri jastak che ri queburayij.
25: Coc'ow ri quiakik' jäb cäsach c'u u wäch ri banal etzelal, are' c'u ri suc' cäjeki' amak'el.
26: Ri sak'or, che ri cätakow bic, jacha' ri ch'amalaj u wa'l uva che ri wareaj o ri sib chque ri bak'wächaj.
27: Ri u ya'ic u k'ij ri Ajawaxel cuyukupej ri c'aslemal, chque c'ut ri e banal tak etzelal quek'ip chque.
28: Chque ri suc', ri petinak chquiwäch quicotemal; chque ri banal tak etzelal, etzelatajic.
29: Ri Ajawaxel quebuch'uk ri cäquiban utzil, cusach c'u qui wäch ri cäquiban lawaloyil.
30: Ri suc' mawi jubik' cätzakmajic, are' c'u ri banal etzelal man cäjeki' ta canok chuwäch ri uwächulew.
31: Che u chi' ri suc' quel wi ulok no'j, are' c'u ri itzel winak caramix na ri rak'.
32: Ri suc' quebubij utzalaj tak jastak; ri banal etzelal xuwi e itzel tak jastak.
